review: This was a great purchase. Basically, if you can't make heads-or-tails from the description, this device turns any television with a HDMI jack into an internet, or smart television while using your smartphone (and I imagine I-phones) to access platforms like Netflix and Hulu.  Not a bad deal for under $50.
author: Draevnn Motkova

review: Super easy to use and very affordable
author: Tracey LeJeune

review: Love it. Easy to set up, easy to use.
author: Echo

review: this is not what I expected.  The streaming from your device to the TV seems to be limited to web based, and that's limited as well.  It took me a while to find a Chrome extension that would stream my movies to the TV, and it is a little iffy on large high quality movies.  I still like it and I'm sure there will be more cast compatible apps, and extensions.
author: DTJ
